content: flower scrubby designed by susan wilkes-baker 2015 materials redheart scrubby and lily sugar n cream cotton hook h your flower scrubby will measure approximately 5 inches in diameter starting with scrubby yarn round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 do not count as a st 2 single_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 12 single_crochet round 3 chain 2 do not count as a st here and throughout 1 half_double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch 2 half_double_crochet in next st *1 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet 18 half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch 1 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in next st *1 half_double_crochet in 1 each of next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet 24 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st *1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet 30 half_double_crochet join cotton and break scrubby round 6 chain 2 1 half_double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 3 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st *1 half_double_crochet in each of next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st* repeat around join with slip_stitch to 1st half_double_crochet 36 half_double_crochet round 7 chain 3 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch skip st slip_stitch in next st skip st *5 double_crochet in next st skip st slip_stitch in next st skip st* repeat around 2 double_crochet in same st as slip_stitch join with slip_stitch to top of chain 3 45 double_crochet & 9 sl sts fasten_off and weave in all the ends give the scrubby section of the flower a little stretch to flatten out the stitches to make your flower lay flat enjoy 2
